name: American Hustle
description: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the Mafia.
keywords: con artist,based on true story,drunk wife,wife meets mistress,strip club

review.author: margineanvladdaniel
review.heading: Christian Bale, again abracadabra!
review.reviewBody: A well deserved movie for all the nominations, not to mention the actors. It had something missing from being undisputed the best of the year, but so far, it is way better than the actual winner of the oscar.
